title: Project-Based Instructional Design for Patient Access Education

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of basic medical terminology and instructional design theory
context.additional_context: Cultivating patient approach education design skills for pre-service and in-service teachers by applying Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction.

learning_goals: Learners can design patient approach education modules using Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Learners develop educational scenarios integrating patient safety protocols (patient identification, specimen handling, etc.) in small-group projects
Learners can design formative assessment tools to measure educational effectiveness
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
